trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing> event to perform custom initialization of the editing control when a cell enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing>-hendelsen for å utføre egendefinerte initialiseringen av redigering kontrollen når en celle går inn i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing>

trans-unit.source: To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilpasse Vis egenskapene for en kontroll ved å angi egenskapene for objektet som returneres av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>egenskapen i stedet for å angi egenskapene for kontrollen som er returnert av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> in which the user will edit the selected cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> som brukeren kan redigere innholdet i den valgte cellen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> representing the style of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen i cellen som redigeres.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cell style of the edited cell.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir cellestilen i den redigerte cellen.

trans-unit.source: To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the CellStyle property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilpasse Vis egenskapene for en kontroll ved å angi egenskapene for objektet som returneres av egenskapen CellStyle i stedet for å angi egenskapene for kontrollen ble returnert av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> representing the style of the cell being edited.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen i cellen som redigeres.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien når du angir denne egenskapen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The control shown to the user for editing the selected cell's value.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen vises for brukeren for redigering verdien for den valgte cellen.

trans-unit.source: To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the Control property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilpasse Vis egenskapene for en kontroll ved å angi egenskapene for objektet som returneres av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>egenskapen i stedet for å angi egenskapene for kontrollen som returneres av egenskapen kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that displays an area for the user to enter or change the selected cell's value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> som viser et område for brukeren å angi eller endre verdien for den valgte cellen.
